reviews.review: Jeux vraiment bien et très stratégique
好玩，拿电击枪电到人了能高兴得笑出猪叫，遇到的大佬都好厉害，打不过就很烦，只希望大佬不要嫌弃我们萌新，下手轻点就好。

Its actually a pretty fun game. However, there were countless times i got banned when I do damage to my teammates as they purposely stood in the fire I threw. Toxic community especially in SEA region. Please take report for griefing/harassment reports into account seriously.
